{"id":767524962,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1659873064,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/767524962/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    double bigpow(double b, int p){\n        if(p==0) return 1.0;\n        // cout<<p<<endl;\n        double ret = 1.0;\n        if(p%2){\n            ret = ret * b * bigpow(b, p-1);\n        }\n        else{\n            ret = ret * bigpow(b, p/2) * bigpow(b, p/2);\n        }\n        // cout<<\"R \"<<ret<<endl;\n        return ret;\n    }\n    \n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if(n==0) return 1.0;\n        \n        bool needtodiv = false;\n        if(n < 0) {\n            n = n * -1;\n            needtodiv = true;\n        }\n        \n        double ans = bigpow(x, n);\n        if(needtodiv) ans = 1/ans;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
